org.rocket

Interface Service

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Startable, Stoppable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    NetworkClientService, NetworkService

    public interface Service
extends Startable, Stoppable
    A Service is started, stopped, described by a path, and might depend on another service. It typically manages a finite set of resources.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ServicePath dependsOn()
      Give the service's parent.
      ServicePath path()
      Give the service's path.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.rocket.Startable

        start

      • Methods inherited from interface org.rocket.Stoppable

        stop

    • Method Detail

        Give the service's path.
        Returns:
        an absolute path

      • dependsOn

        Give the service's parent.
        Returns:
